trans-unit.source: About VPN Devices for site-to-site Azure Virtual Network connections | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: About VPN Devices for site-to-site Azure Virtual Network connections | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn about VPN devices and IPsec parameters for Azure Virtual Network site-to-site VPN Gateway connections.
trans-unit.target: Learn about VPN devices and IPsec parameters for Azure Virtual Network site-to-site VPN Gateway connections.

trans-unit.source: About VPN devices for site-to-site virtual network connections
trans-unit.target: About VPN devices for site-to-site virtual network connections

trans-unit.source: A VPN device is required in order to configure a site-to-site VPN connection.
trans-unit.target: A VPN device is required in order to configure a site-to-site VPN connection.

trans-unit.source: Site-to-site connections can be used to create a hybrid cloud solution, or whenever you want a secure connection between your on-premises network and your virtual network.
trans-unit.target: Site-to-site connections can be used to create a hybrid cloud solution, or whenever you want a secure connection between your on-premises network and your virtual network.

trans-unit.source: This article discusses compatible VPN devices and configuration parameters.
trans-unit.target: This article discusses compatible VPN devices and configuration parameters.

trans-unit.source: It's important to know that, in addition to a compatible VPN device, site-to-site connections also require a public-facing IPv4 IP address.
trans-unit.target: It's important to know that, in addition to a compatible VPN device, site-to-site connections also require a public-facing IPv4 IP address.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, you'll want to select the gateway type that will support your solution.
trans-unit.target: Additionally, you'll want to select the gateway type that will support your solution.

trans-unit.source: Not all VPN devices support all gateway types.
trans-unit.target: Not all VPN devices support all gateway types.

trans-unit.source: See [VPN gateways](vpn-gateway-about-vpngateways.md) to verify the type of gateway that you need to create your solution.
trans-unit.target: See [VPN gateways](vpn-gateway-about-vpngateways.md) to verify the type of gateway that you need to create your solution.

trans-unit.source: We have validated a set of standard site-to-site (S2S) VPN devices in partnership with device vendors.
trans-unit.target: We have validated a set of standard site-to-site (S2S) VPN devices in partnership with device vendors.

trans-unit.source: For a list of the VPN devices that are known to be compatible with Virtual Network, see the [Compatible VPN devices](#compatible-vpn-devices) section, below.
trans-unit.target: For a list of the VPN devices that are known to be compatible with Virtual Network, see the [Compatible VPN devices](#compatible-vpn-devices) section, below.

trans-unit.source: All devices in the device families contained in this list should work with Azure VPN gateways.
trans-unit.target: All devices in the device families contained in this list should work with Azure VPN gateways.

trans-unit.source: To help configure your VPN device, refer to the device configuration sample that corresponds to appropriate device family.
trans-unit.target: To help configure your VPN device, refer to the device configuration sample that corresponds to appropriate device family.

trans-unit.source: The specifications for High Performance VPN gateway and Dynamic Routing VPN gateway are the same unless otherwise noted.
trans-unit.target: The specifications for High Performance VPN gateway and Dynamic Routing VPN gateway are the same unless otherwise noted.

trans-unit.source: For example, the validated VPN devices that are compatible with Azure Dynamic Routing VPN gateways will also be compatible with the new Azure High Performance VPN gateway.
trans-unit.target: For example, the validated VPN devices that are compatible with Azure Dynamic Routing VPN gateways will also be compatible with the new Azure High Performance VPN gateway.

trans-unit.source: We have worked with VPN device vendors to jointly qualify specific VPN device families.
trans-unit.target: We have worked with VPN device vendors to jointly qualify specific VPN device families.

trans-unit.source: The section below provides a list of all device families known to work with our VPN gateway.
trans-unit.target: The section below provides a list of all device families known to work with our VPN gateway.

trans-unit.source: All devices that are members of the listed device families are known to work unless exceptions are mentioned.
trans-unit.target: All devices that are members of the listed device families are known to work unless exceptions are mentioned.

trans-unit.source: If your device does not appear on the list, see [Devices not on the compatible list](#devices-not-on-the-compatible-list).
trans-unit.target: If your device does not appear on the list, see [Devices not on the compatible list](#devices-not-on-the-compatible-list).

trans-unit.source: For VPN device support, please contact your device manufacturer.
trans-unit.target: For VPN device support, please contact your device manufacturer.

trans-unit.source: CloudBridge MPX appliance, or VPX virtual appliance
trans-unit.target: CloudBridge MPX appliance, or VPX virtual appliance

trans-unit.source: TZ Series, NSA Series, SuperMassive Series, E-Class NSA Series
trans-unit.target: TZ Series, NSA Series, SuperMassive Series, E-Class NSA Series

trans-unit.source: Routing and Remote Access Service (RRAS) samples
trans-unit.target: Routing and Remote Access Service (RRAS) samples

trans-unit.source: All devices running PAN-OS 5.0 or greater
trans-unit.target: All devices running PAN-OS 5.0 or greater

trans-unit.source: Devices not on the compatible list
trans-unit.target: Devices not on the compatible list

trans-unit.source: If you don’t see your device in the known compatible VPN device list and want to use the device for your VPN connection, you’ll need to verify that it meets the minimum requirements outlined in the [Gateway requirements](vpn-gateway-about-vpngateways.md#gateway-requirements) table.
trans-unit.target: If you don’t see your device in the known compatible VPN device list and want to use the device for your VPN connection, you’ll need to verify that it meets the minimum requirements outlined in the [Gateway requirements](vpn-gateway-about-vpngateways.md#gateway-requirements) table.

trans-unit.source: Devices meeting the minimum requirements should also work well with Virtual Network.
trans-unit.target: Devices meeting the minimum requirements should also work well with Virtual Network.

trans-unit.source: Please contact your device manufacturer for additional support and configuration instructions.
trans-unit.target: Please contact your device manufacturer for additional support and configuration instructions.

trans-unit.source: After you download the provided VPN device configuration sample, you’ll need to replace some of the values to reflect the settings for your environment.
trans-unit.target: After you download the provided VPN device configuration sample, you’ll need to replace some of the values to reflect the settings for your environment.

trans-unit.source: Search and replace all <*text*> strings with the values that pertain to your environment.
trans-unit.target: Search and replace all <*text*> strings with the values that pertain to your environment.

trans-unit.source: When a name is specified, the name you select should be unique.
trans-unit.target: When a name is specified, the name you select should be unique.

trans-unit.source: If a command does not work, please consult your device manufacturer documentation.
trans-unit.target: If a command does not work, please consult your device manufacturer documentation.

trans-unit.source: Your chosen name for this object.
trans-unit.target: Your chosen name for this object.

trans-unit.source: This information specific to your virtual network and is located in the Management Portal as **Gateway IP address**.
trans-unit.target: This information specific to your virtual network and is located in the Management Portal as **Gateway IP address**.

trans-unit.source: This information is specific to your virtual network and is located in the Management Portal as Manage Key.
trans-unit.target: This information is specific to your virtual network and is located in the Management Portal as Manage Key.

trans-unit.target: Dynamic Routing VPN gateway and Standard or HighPerformance VPN gateway

trans-unit.target: See Dynamic Routing Gateway IPsec Security Association (SA) Offers

trans-unit.target: Dynamic Routing Gateway IPsec Security Association (SA) Offers

trans-unit.source: The table below lists IPsec SA Encryption and Authentication Offers.
trans-unit.target: The table below lists IPsec SA Encryption and Authentication Offers.

trans-unit.source: Offers are listed the order of preference that the offer is presented or accepted.
trans-unit.target: Offers are listed the order of preference that the offer is presented or accepted.

trans-unit.source: You can specify IPsec ESP NULL encryption with Dynamic Routing and High Performance VPN gateway, intended for VNet-to-VNet connections within Azure networks.
trans-unit.target: You can specify IPsec ESP NULL encryption with Dynamic Routing and High Performance VPN gateway, intended for VNet-to-VNet connections within Azure networks.

trans-unit.source: For cross-premises connectivity through the Internet, please use the default Azure VPN gateway settings with encryption and hashing algorithms listed in the tables above to ensure security of your critical communication.
trans-unit.target: For cross-premises connectivity through the Internet, please use the default Azure VPN gateway settings with encryption and hashing algorithms listed in the tables above to ensure security of your critical communication.

trans-unit.source: To learn more about VPN gateways, see [About VPN gateways](vpn-gateway-about-vpngateways.md).
trans-unit.target: To learn more about VPN gateways, see [About VPN gateways](vpn-gateway-about-vpngateways.md).

trans-unit.source: To configure a site-to-site VPN, see [Create a virtual network with a site-to-site VPN connection](vpn-gateway-site-to-site-create.md).
trans-unit.target: To configure a site-to-site VPN, see [Create a virtual network with a site-to-site VPN connection](vpn-gateway-site-to-site-create.md).
